description:
Demolition of all existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide a 38,495m data centre (Use Class B8) with associated energy and electrical infrastructure comprising two main linked  buildings (up to 8 storeys and 44m in height), visitor reception building, security gatehouse, plant, boundary enclosures, car and 
cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping; and associated alterations to vehicular access arrangements including creation 
of new access from Concord Road and new access from Western 
Avenue service road; and associated external works
(Out of Borough Consultation from the Old Oak and Park Royal Development Corporation)
site_name: Site Of Renault Retail Group Ltd, , Western Avenue/Concord Road LONDON, W3 0RZ
